title: Enhancing Medical Practice Competencies: Analysis and Application of Key Elements for Improving Online Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer application skills and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three self-efficacy enhancement strategies to improve self-directed learning abilities in online environments.
Learners can identify and apply at least two instructional design elements that induce task immersion (flow) in VR simulation environments.
Learners can understand the basic procedures for analyzing online survey data using structural equation modeling and practice them at least once.
Learners can present at least one case where intrinsic motivation factors related to language learning outcomes are reflected in project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
